languages.text: "Я {g|Encyclopedia:Lexmechanic}лексмеханик{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Manufactorum}мануфакторума{/g} Дзета-86. Когда-то я отправлял ритуалы для машинных духов девяносто пятой плавильни... до тех пор, пока братия не начала сходить с ума! Преданные {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Омниссии{/g} жрецы вдруг начали славить какой-то восход... останавливать ленты... а потом осквернять лик священных машин нечестивыми знаками!"

traits.locale_text: "Я {g|Encyclopedia:Lexmechanic}лексмеханик{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Manufactorum}мануфакторума{/g} Дзета-86. Когда-то я отправлял ритуалы для машинных духов девяносто пятой плавильни... до тех пор, пока братия не начала сходить с ума! Преданные {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Омниссии{/g} жрецы вдруг начали славить какой-то восход... останавливать ленты... а потом осквернять лик священных машин нечестивыми знаками!"
traits.speaker: ScrappedTechpriest

languages.text: "I am {g|Encyclopedia:Manufactorum}manufactorum{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Lexmechanic}Lexmechanic{/g} Zeta-86. I performed the rituals for the machine spirits of Foundry 95... up until we started going mad! Priests devoted to the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g} suddenly started praising the dawn of something or other... they stopped the belts... and then they desecrated the visages of the sacred machines with unholy symbols!"
languages.original_text: "Я {g|Encyclopedia:Lexmechanic}лексмеханик{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Manufactorum}мануфакторума{/g} Дзета-86. Когда-то я отправлял ритуалы для машинных духов девяносто пятой плавильни... до тех пор, пока братия не начала сходить с ума! Преданные {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Омниссии{/g} жрецы вдруг начали славить какой-то восход... останавливать ленты... а потом осквернять лик священных машин нечестивыми знаками!"

traits.locale_text: "I am the lexmechanic from Manufactorum Zeta-86. I performed the rituals for the machine spirits of Foundry 95... up until the brothers started going mad! Priests devoted to the Omnissiah suddenly started praising the dawn of something or other... they stopped the belts... and then they desecrated the visages of the sacred machines with unholy symbols!"
traits.speaker: ScrappedTechpriest

traits.locale_text: "I am the lexmechanic from Manufactorum Zeta-86. I performed the rituals for the machine spirits of Foundry 95... up until the brothers started going mad! Priests devoted to the Omnissiah suddenly started praising the dawn of something or other... they stopped the belts... and then they desecrated the visages of the sacred machines with unholy symbols!"

I performed the rituals for the machine spirits of Foundry 95... up until we started going mad! Priests devoted to the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g} suddenly started praising the dawn of something or other... they stopped the belts... and then they desecrated the visages of the sacred machines with unholy symbols!"
traits.speaker: ScrappedTechpriest

languages.text: “我是{g|Encyclopedia:Manufactorum}制造工厂{/g}的{g|Encyclopedia:Lexmechanic}思律机僧{/g}泽塔86号。我当时正在为95号铸造厂的机魂举行仪式……但随后我的伙伴们就发起了疯！那些原本信仰{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}欧姆尼塞亚{/g}的神甫，突然开始赞美什么黎明之类的……他们把传送带停了下来……之后用邪恶的印记玷污了神圣的机器！”
languages.original_text: "I am {g|Encyclopedia:Manufactorum}manufactorum{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Lexmechanic}Lexmechanic{/g} Zeta-86. I performed the rituals for the machine spirits of Foundry 95... up until we started going mad! Priests devoted to the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g} suddenly started praising the dawn of something or other... they stopped the belts... and then they desecrated the visages of the sacred machines with unholy symbols!"

traits.locale_text: “我是制造工厂的{g|Encyclopedia:Lexmechanic}法律技工{/g}泽塔86号。我当时正在为95号铸造厂的机魂举行仪式……但随后我的兄弟们就发起了疯！那些原本信仰欧姆尼塞亚的祭司，突然开始赞美什么黎明之类的……他们把传送带停了下来……之后用邪恶的印记玷污了神圣的机器！”
traits.speaker: ScrappedTechpriest

languages.text: «Soy el {g|Encyclopedia:Lexmechanic}lexmecánico{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:Manufactorum}manufactorum{/g} Zeta-86. Realizaba los rituales para los espíritus máquina de Fundición 95... ¡hasta que nos empezamos a volver locos! Unos sacerdotes dedicados al {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g} comenzaron a alabar al amanecer de algo... detuvieron las cintas... ¡y después profanaron el semblante de las máquinas sagradas con símbolos impíos!».
languages.original_text: "I am {g|Encyclopedia:Manufactorum}manufactorum{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Lexmechanic}Lexmechanic{/g} Zeta-86. I performed the rituals for the machine spirits of Foundry 95... up until we started going mad! Priests devoted to the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g} suddenly started praising the dawn of something or other... they stopped the belts... and then they desecrated the visages of the sacred machines with unholy symbols!"

traits.locale_text: «Soy el {g|Encyclopedia:Lexmechanic}lexmecánico{/g} de manufactorum Zeta-86. Realizaba los rituales para los espíritus máquina de Fundición 95... ¡hasta que los hermanos se volvieron locos! Unos sacerdotes dedicados al Omnissiah comenzaron a alabar al amanecer de algo... detuvieron las cintas... ¡y después profanaron el semblante de las máquinas sagradas con símbolos impíos!».
traits.speaker: ScrappedTechpriest

languages.text: 「私は{g|Encyclopedia:Manufactorum}聖工場{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Lexmechanic}法技術者{/g}Zeta-86。私はファウンドリー95の機械精霊の儀式を行っていました…みんなが狂い始めるまでは！{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}万機神{/g}に献身する司祭たちが突然、何かの夜明けを賛美し始めたのです…彼らはラインを止め…そして神聖な機械を不浄のシンボルで冒涜したのです！」
languages.original_text: "I am {g|Encyclopedia:Manufactorum}manufactorum{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Lexmechanic}Lexmechanic{/g} Zeta-86. I performed the rituals for the machine spirits of Foundry 95... up until we started going mad! Priests devoted to the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g} suddenly started praising the dawn of something or other... they stopped the belts... and then they desecrated the visages of the sacred machines with unholy symbols!"

traits.locale_text: 「私は{g|Encyclopedia:Manufactorum}聖工場{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Lexmechanic}法技術者{/g}Zeta-86。私はファウンドリー95の機械精霊の儀式を行っていました…みんなが狂い始めるまでは！{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}万機神{/g}に献身する司祭たちが突然、何かの夜明けを賛美し始めたのです…彼らはラインを止め…そして神聖な機械を不浄のシンボルで冒涜したのです！」
traits.speaker: ScrappedTechpriest

languages.text: "Ich bin {g|Encyclopedia:Manufactorum}Manufactorum{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Lexmechanic}Lexmechanicus{/g} Zeta-86. Ich habe die Rituale für die Maschinengeister von Gießerei 95 durchgeführt ... bis wir wahnsinnig geworden sind! Dem {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g} geweihte Priester priesen plötzlich irgendeine Dämmerung ... sie hielten die Fließbänder an ... und dann entweihten sie die Gesichter der heiligen Maschinen mit unheiligen Symbolen!"
languages.original_text: "I am {g|Encyclopedia:Manufactorum}manufactorum{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Lexmechanic}Lexmechanic{/g} Zeta-86. I performed the rituals for the machine spirits of Foundry 95... up until we started going mad! Priests devoted to the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g} suddenly started praising the dawn of something or other... they stopped the belts... and then they desecrated the visages of the sacred machines with unholy symbols!"

traits.locale_text: "Ich bin Manufactorum {g|Encyclopedia:Lexmechanic}Lexmechanicus{/g} Zeta-86. Ich habe die Rituale für die Maschinengeister von Gießerei 95 durchgeführt ... bis die Brüder wahnsinnig geworden sind! Dem Omnissiah geweihte Priester priesen plötzlich irgendeine Dämmerung ... sie hielten die Fließbänder an ... und dann entweihten sie die Gesichter der heiligen Maschinen mit unheiligen Symbolen!"
traits.speaker: ScrappedTechpriest

languages.text: « Je suis le {g|Encyclopedia:Lexmechanic}lexmécanicien{/g} Zêta-86 du {g|Encyclopedia:Manufactorum}manufactorum{/g}. J'étais chargé de réaliser les rituels pour les esprits de la machine dans la fonderie n° 95... jusqu'à ce qu'on commence à perdre la tête ! Des prêtres dévoués à l'{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnimessie{/g} se sont soudain mis à glorifier l'avènement ou l'aube de quelque chose... Ils ont arrêté les convoyeurs... puis profané les machines sacrées en les couvrant de symboles impies ! »
languages.original_text: "I am {g|Encyclopedia:Manufactorum}manufactorum{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Lexmechanic}Lexmechanic{/g} Zeta-86. I performed the rituals for the machine spirits of Foundry 95... up until we started going mad! Priests devoted to the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g} suddenly started praising the dawn of something or other... they stopped the belts... and then they desecrated the visages of the sacred machines with unholy symbols!"

traits.locale_text: « Je suis le {g|Encyclopedia:Lexmechanic}lexmécanicien{/g} Zêta-86 du manufactorum. J'étais chargé de réaliser les rituels pour les esprits de la machine dans la fonderie n° 95... jusqu'à ce que mes frères perdent la tête ! Des prêtres dévoués à l'Omnimessie se sont soudain mis à glorifier l'avènement ou l'aube de quelque chose... Ils ont arrêté les convoyeurs... puis profané les machines sacrées en les couvrant de symboles impies ! »
traits.speaker: ScrappedTechpriest

languages.text: "{g|Encyclopedia:Manufactorum}Manufaktorum{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Lexmechanic}Lexmekaniği{/g} Zeta-86. 95. Dökümhane'deki makine ruhlarının ayinlerini ben yapmıştım... Ta ki biz delirene dek! Kendini {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Hermesih'e{/g} adamış rahipler, birden bilmem neyin şafağına şükretmeye başladı... Kayışları durdurdular... Sonra da kutsal makineleri meşum sembollerle kapladılar!"
languages.original_text: "I am {g|Encyclopedia:Manufactorum}manufactorum{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Lexmechanic}Lexmechanic{/g} Zeta-86. I performed the rituals for the machine spirits of Foundry 95... up until we started going mad! Priests devoted to the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g} suddenly started praising the dawn of something or other... they stopped the belts... and then they desecrated the visages of the sacred machines with unholy symbols!"

traits.locale_text: “{g|Encyclopedia:Manufactorum}Manufaktorum{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Lexmechanic}Lexmekaniği{/g} Zeta-86. 95. Dökümhane’deki makine ruhlarının ayinlerini ben yapmıştım... Ta ki biz delirene dek! Kendini {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Hermesih{/g}’e adamış rahipler birden bilmem neyin şafağına şükretmeye başladı... Kayışları durdurdular... Sonra da kutsal makineleri meşum sembollerle kapladılar!”
traits.speaker: ScrappedTechpriest
